Promotions and perks About this item Condition Brand New Quantity 1 available Item Number 225647366161 ISBN-10 1500569070 Publication Name CreateSpace Independent Publishing Platform Item description from the seller Item description from the seller SPIRITUAL DETOX: IMPROVE YOUR HEALTH By Madelene Eayrs, Michael Kleu **BRAND NEW**. See full description Product Information Not healthy or feeling ill? Why not try a spiritual detox? It identifies and shows you how to effectively deal with toxic agents that poison your body, soul and spirit. Spiritual Detox highlights many biblical insights for optimizing your health. Did you know that eye problems can be caused by greed; heart problems by fear; back and neck issues by pride; hand problems by cruelty, and cancers by bitterness? These are only a few of the biblical findings you will learn about in this book! Dive into Spiritual Detox, where the Index of Illnesses makes it easy to identify the toxic agents you're dealing with! Once you have the agents, Spiritual Detox leads you into deliverance and freedom using the principles taught in the Bible. Take a step to improve your health with a Spiritual Detox today!
